oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1957-11-02 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from November 2, 1957. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Ferlin Husky (host/performer), guest performer Justin Tubb, and regular performers the Jordanaires, Pete Stamper, Shorty Lavender, Chet Atkins, Minnie Pearl (celebrating her 17th anniversary on the Opry), Stringbean, and Millie Kirkham. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN. It is announced that this is the 943rd broadcast.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Minnie Pearl; Justin Tubb; Jordanaires; Stringbean; Ferlin Husky; Millie Kirkham
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Comedy routine (Minnie Pearl) [continued from part 1] -- Prince Albert commercial (Ferlin Husky, Minnie Pearl) -- Prince Albert jingle -- Ferlin Husky introduces Justin Tubb -- Got A Lot Of Livin' To Do (Justin Tubb, Jordanaires) -- Ferlin Husky introduces Stringbean -- Hillbilly Fever (Stringbean) -- Ferlin Husky talks -- Gone (Ferlin Husky, Jordanaires, Millie Kirkham) -- Closing theme -- Closing statement (Ferlin Husky) -- Camel Cigarettes jingle -- Station announcements (Grant Turner) -- Noel Hotel commercial (Grant Turner) (incomplete) -- Ben-Gay commercial (incomplete)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); United States. Armed Forces Radio Service; Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); Turner, Grant; Minnie Pearl; Stamper, Pete, 1930-; Atkins, Chet; Stringbean, 1915-1973; Jordanaires (Musical group); Kirkham, Millie; Lavender, Shorty; Husky, Ferlin; Tubb, Justin
